metadata.title: CVE-2024-42992 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Rejected reason: DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none.Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigationshowed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

criterions.comment: pandas package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
